fields.title: Bookstore Certificate ($25)
fields.short_description: $25 UH Bookstore Gift Certificate for the individual with the highest number of points at the end of Round 1.
fields.long_description:
Books, notebooks, magazines, art supplies, computers... you name it, the UH Bookstore's got it. With this gift certificate you'll be able to pick something up that you need (or maybe just want!).

This $25 gift certificate goes to the individual across all four towers with the highest point total at the end of Round 1.

fields.title: Bookstore Certificate ($5)
fields.short_description: $5 UH Bookstore Gift Certificate for the individual who earns the most points in each lounge by the end of Round 1.
fields.long_description:
Books, notebooks, magazines, art supplies, computers... you name it, the UH Bookstore's got it. With this gift certificate you'll be able to pick something up that you need (or maybe just want!).

To win this $5 gift certificate, you must earn more points than any other person in your lounge by the end of Round 1.

fields.title: Cupcake Extravaganza
fields.short_description: Delicious cupcakes for the lounge that makes the most daily energy goals during Round 1.
fields.long_description:
Gourmet cupcakes in an assortment of ono flavors will be delivered to the winning lounge.

To win this cupcake party, your lounge members must make the most daily energy goals of any lounge across all four towers during Round 1.

fields.title: Mochi Ice Cream Party
fields.short_description: Mochi Ice Cream Party by Bubbies for the lounge that earns the most points during Round 1.
fields.long_description:
Imagine a harmonious combination of creamy gourmet ice cream wrapped in a sweetened rice confection, all resulting in a delectable bite-sized, one and a quarter ounce ball of happiness. As the lounge with the lowest energy usage for this round, you'll snack out on a selection of Bubbies Mochi Ice Cream balls.

To win this prize, your lounge must earn more points than any other lounge across all four towers during Round 1.

fields.title: iPad
fields.short_description: iPad 3 for the individual with the greatest number of points across all four towers at the end of Round 2.
fields.long_description:
Retina Display. A5X chip with quad-core graphics. 5 megapixel FaceTime camera. 10-hour battery. It's not a tablet, it's the new iPad.

To win this iPad, you must earn more points than any other individual in all four towers at the end of Round 2.

fields.title: Bubbies ($4.95)
fields.short_description: $4.95 Bubbies Gift Certificate for the individual who earns the most points in each lounge at the end of Round 2.
fields.long_description: Use this gift certificate to score your very own at Bubbies, or else use it on a down payment for a larger purchase!

fields.title: Energy Pizza Party
fields.short_description: Pizza party for the lounge that makes the most daily energy goals by the end of Round 2.
fields.long_description: You did it! As the lounge that made the most daily energy goals by the end of Round 2 out of all four towers, you'll be grinding on a selection of pizzas from one of Hawaii's best pizza parlors.

fields.title: Pool Party
fields.short_description: Pool party for the lounge whose members earned the greatest number of points by the end of Round 2 of the Kukui Cup.
fields.long_description:
You did it!  As the lounge that earned the most points out of all four towers, you'll be attending a pool party. 

To win this pool party, your lounge must earn more points than any other lounge across all four towers by the end of Round 2.

fields.title: Bookstore Certificate ($100)
fields.short_description: $100 UH Bookstore Gift Certificate for the individual with the most points at the end of Round 3.
fields.long_description:
Books, notebooks, magazines, art supplies, computers... you name it, the UH Bookstore's got it. With this gift certificate you'll be able to pick something up that you need (or maybe just want!).

This $100 gift certificate goes to the individual across all four towers with the highest point total at the end of Round 3.

fields.title: Milano Freezer Card
fields.short_description: $5 Milano Freezer Gift Card for the individual who earns the most points in each lounge by the end of Round 3.
fields.long_description:
Milano Freezer in Manoa Marketplace specializes in high quality gelato, yogurt, and smoothies with all the freshest ingredients. Everything is made in the store daily and there is a wide variety of flavors.

To win this $5 gift certificate, you must earn more points than any other person in your lounge by the end of Round 3.

fields.title: Mochi Party
fields.short_description: Mochi Ice Cream Party by Bubbies for the lounge that makes the most daily energy goals by the end of Round 3.
fields.long_description:
Imagine a harmonious combination of creamy gourmet ice cream wrapped in a sweetened rice confection, all resulting in a delectable bite-sized, one and a quarter ounce ball of happiness. As the lounge that made the most daily energy goals so far, you'll snack out on a selection of Bubbies Mochi Ice Cream balls.

To win this prize, your lounge members must make the most daily energy goals of any lounge across all four towers by the end of Round 3.

fields.title: Malasada Madness
fields.short_description: Malasadas for the lounge whose members earned the greatest number of points by the end of Round 3 of the Kukui Cup.
fields.long_description:
Malasadas are Hawaii's favorite doughnut, and Leonard's Bakery has been perfecting the malasada since 1952.

To win this malasada party, your lounge must earn more points than any other lounge across all four towers by the end of Round 3.

fields.title: Individual Overall Prize
fields.short_description: Incredible über prize to be announced later for the individual with the highest number of points by the end of Round 4 (the end of the Kukui Cup!)
fields.long_description: Incredible über prize to be announced later for the individual with the highest number of points by the end of Round 4 (the end of the Kukui Cup!)

fields.title: Team Overall Prize
fields.short_description: Cool prize to be announced later for the lounge that that makes the most daily energy goals by the end of Round 4 (the end of the Kukui Cup!)
fields.long_description: Cool prize to be announced later for the lounge that that makes the most daily energy goals by the end of Round 4 (the end of the Kukui Cup!)

fields.title: Team Overall Prize
fields.short_description: Cool prize to be announced later for the lounge whose members earned the greatest number of points by the end of Round 4 (the end of the Kukui Cup!)
fields.long_description: Cool prize to be announced later for the lounge whose members earned the greatest number of points by the end of Round 4 (the end of the Kukui Cup!)
